CustomField.description:
Typically used for providing S/N lists of Endpoints.
501 is the skinny version identifying Endpoint S/N and Encoder S/N, only.
502 is for the modified version including the Meter:Endpoint S/N, Meter S/N, Encoder S/N, only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Typically used for providing S/N lists of Endpoints.
501 is the skinny version identifying Endpoint S/N and Encoder S/N, only.
502 is for the modified version including the Meter:Endpoint S/N, Meter S/N, Encoder S/N, only.
CustomField.label: Content/Layout #2
